author: Dinesh Narayanan
title: Kerala may tweak healthcare administration to link modern and traditional medicine systems
description: The Kerala task force report points out how China effectively used traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) in tandem with modern medicine to prevent the spread of Covid-19 outside its Wuhan province, the epicentre of the global pandemic.
content: The southern state of Kerala, whose astute management of the Covid-19 pandemic has won global acclaim, is interlinking the administrative framework of traditional medicine systems in the state with its public health administrative system to aggressively comba… [+3673 chars]
